messages.message:
This actually just came up on a compliance call with sixfold just now (cc: @Chris). We provide a user a way to delete a conversation and project, but not an app run. This means that for a customer who uses IB drive, there is no way for them to delete data from the system unless they reach out to us.

We should add this to the backlog (I'll create a ticket cc: @andy) and perhaps we can use the mechanism that @Cheryl Zhou is working on for being able to remove app runs on unmount.
